بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم وصلّى اللّه علَى محمّد واللّه وآله سلّم وسلّم
أعلم الأخ نجيب حفظه اللّه وتولّاه أنّني
سيّرت صحبة أبو سليمان مولا القاضي جمال الدّين
حملين دقيق مغربلة بغربال الشّعير
فيحرص الأخ أن إن لعيلقي لهم بيع تبيعهم لي ما تحتاج
وصّيته وصيّة في ذلك وتبعذ وتنفذ لي الإمرة والعرا
وعلامتهم الحنّا بالحنّاء مــ

إن لعپپلقيت كتبت كفيت للسّمن سعر في عشرة دراهم وطالع

إلى شونة أبو مفرّج يسلّم للأخ نجيب حفظه اللّه

In the name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate. May God bless the Prophet Muḥammad and grant him salvation!
I am writing to inform Brother Najīb - may God protect him and take care of him! - that I have
dispatched, accompanied by Abū Sulaymān the deputy of the judge Jamāl ad-Dīn,
two loads of flour sifted in a sieve used for barley.
... if there is an opportunity to sell them ... You do not require Mein Bruder (sc. der Adressat) möge darauf bedacht sein, sie, wenn er für sie eine Verkaufsmöglichkeit findet, für mich zu verkaufen. Du brauchst O brother, make sure to put them on sale. Sell them for me. Whatever you need,
hierbei (sicherlich) keine Ermahnung. ... instruction for this. ... simply order it; just send me the order (al-imra). ... simply order it; just send me the order forms and [?],
and their mark in henna ... and their mark [ought to be? ...........]
O God, O God, [send them] in two baṭṭa-containers which had been dispatched [earlier? ......]
If you find [the right] price for clarified butter, at ten dirhams or higher [........]
and for oil, at four [dirhams ...........] and a half [.....]
even though it hasn't [..........................]
to [..................................................]
[Put the goods] in a [safe] place. [....... Say hello]
for me to the mayor [and ..........]. [Peace]
be upon you and God's mercy [be upon you]. Send my regards to
Brother Sulṭān. [I wish for] his son, his family, his father, ... Seinem Jungen, seiner Familie, seinem Vater
and his brothers nothing but blessings. Tell him to work hard for me on the [deal] und seinen Brüdern geht es bestens.
I entrusted him to do [........ And upon him to be]
peace. My father is here and he says hello to you all.
May God bless the Prophet Muḥammad and grant him salvation!
To Abū Mufarrij's warehouse, to the car of Brother Najīb - may God protect him!
From ʿAlī ibn Badr.
